ArgonTest.Name: Bool logical operators
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
proc print_left(value: Bool): Bool do puts "left" value end
proc print_right(value: Bool): Bool do puts "right" value end
proc print_bool(value: Bool): () do puts (value.to_s()) end
proc main(): () do print_bool (print_left true || print_right true) print_bool (print_left true || print_right false) print_bool (print_left false || print_right true) print_bool (print_left false || print_right false) print_bool (print_left true && print_right true) print_bool (print_left true && print_right false) print_bool (print_left false && print_right true) print_bool (print_left false && print_right false) end
ArgonTest.ExpectedOutput: left true left true left right true left right false left right true left right false left false left false
